currentPage.title: Cinemanord
currentPage.content:
Filmmaker and producer Andreas Lindemark lives in Stockholm and operates the production company CinemaNord. Andreas ambition is to produce commercial and documentary films that touch, inspire, influence, explain and engage.

CinemaNord helps companies increase sales, build relationships and strengthen their brands. We are storytellers at heart and use our film and communication expertise to produce films for all platforms. We are specialized in documentary and commercial storytelling.

We produce both external and internal content to TV-channels, e-learning companies, banks, insurance companies and companies within areas as event and pr.

With our focus on quality, we help clients achieve entertaining and impactful moving images across all media. CinemaNord produce infomercials, commercials, TV-news, internal communication, B2B.

Our advantage is that we produce high quality products at fair prices than if you would turn to for example an advertising agency.

You can expect a professional and efficient video service that delivers results.
